name: Backlog
body:
# Backlog
Backlog is an app designed to help you keep track of your growing list of unfinished games.

### List Format
Quickly refer to the games in your backlog with the handy list on the main page.

### Jog Your Memory
Save a description of your games, and view a related web page to refresh your memory.  This way, you won't forget where you were, no matter how long it's been since you last played!

### Authors and Contributors
Backlog was written in a few short weeks by Patrick Shanahan (@patrickshanahan), so direct your complaints accordingly.

### Support or Contact
Backlog is entirely free, but if you'd like to donate or just want more information, please visit www.backlog.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
